description: Phase 7: Diagnostic Intelligence System - Lab interpretation, diagnostic algorithms, and test recommendations

userStories.title: Lab Value Interpretation Engine
userStories.description: Comprehensive lab test interpretation with clinical context
acceptanceCriteria: Database of 200+ common lab tests with reference ranges
Pattern recognition (anemia panels, liver panels, etc.)
userStories.notes: Already implemented in core/labs/ with 72+ lab tests, reference ranges, patterns

userStories.title: Diagnostic Algorithm Library
acceptanceCriteria: Implement 20+ common diagnostic algorithms (chest pain, syncope, etc.)
Show evidence basis for each step

userStories.title: Test Recommendation Engine
userStories.description: Suggest appropriate diagnostic tests based on clinical picture
acceptanceCriteria: Explain what each test would reveal

userStories.title: Lab Results Dashboard
userStories.description: Visual dashboard for tracking and understanding lab results
acceptanceCriteria: Input lab values manually or from health records
